languages.text: "Конечно, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Изнурительным трудом десятков крепких рабочих он заставляет жидкость течь по трубам вверх! Полезнейший агрегат!"
"Naturally, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! It requires the gruelling labour of dozens of sturdy workers to create an upward movement of the liquid in the pipes! It is a most useful contraption!"
languages.original_text: "Конечно, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Изнурительным трудом десятков крепких рабочих он заставляет жидкость течь по трубам вверх! Полезнейший агрегат!"

languages.text: “那是自然，来自上界的大人！想要让管道里喷出美酒，这需要几十名强壮的工人拼命工作，才能实现这样的绝景！水泵确实是非常有用的装置！”
languages.original_text: "Naturally, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! It requires the gruelling labour of dozens of sturdy workers to create an upward movement of the liquid in the pipes! It is a most useful contraption!"

traits.locale_text: “那是自然，来自上界的大人！想要让管道里喷出美酒，这需要几十名强壮的工人拼命工作，才能实现这样的绝景！水泵确实是非常有用的装置！”

languages.text: 「左様でございます、天の{mf|君|姫}！この液体を配管の中で上へと押し上げるには、何十人もの屈強な労働者による過酷な作業が必要なのです！これはじつに便利な仕掛けですよ！」
languages.original_text: "Naturally, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! It requires the gruelling labour of dozens of sturdy workers to create an upward movement of the liquid in the pipes! It is a most useful contraption!"

traits.locale_text: 「左様でございます、天の{mf|君|姫}！この液体を配管の中で上へと押し上げるには、何十人もの屈強な労働者による過酷な作業が必要なのです！これはじつに便利な仕掛けですよ！」

languages.text: «¡Naturalmente, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial! ¡Se requiere un esfuerzo agotador por parte de docenas de braceros fornidos a fin de impulsar el licor hacia arriba por las tuberías! ¡Es un mecanismo de lo más útil!».
languages.original_text: "Naturally, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! It requires the gruelling labour of dozens of sturdy workers to create an upward movement of the liquid in the pipes! It is a most useful contraption!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Naturalmente, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial! ¡Se requiere un esfuerzo agotador por parte de docenas de braceros fornidos a fin de impulsar el licor hacia arriba por las tuberías! ¡Es un mecanismo de lo más útil!».

languages.text: "Elbette Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}! Sıvının borularda yukarı doğru hareket etmesini sağlamak için onlarca kuvvetli işçi kollarını çalıştırıyor! Çok faydalı bir düzenek!"
languages.original_text: "Naturally, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! It requires the gruelling labour of dozens of sturdy workers to create an upward movement of the liquid in the pipes! It is a most useful contraption!"

traits.locale_text: "Elbette Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}! Sıvının borularda yukarı doğru hareket etmesini sağlamak için onlarca kuvvetli işçi kollarını çalıştırıyor! Çok faydalı bir düzenek!"

languages.text: « Naturellement, Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! Elle nécessite les efforts éreintants de dizaines de robustes travailleurs pour faire jaillir le liquide des tuyaux ! C'est une invention fort utile ! »
languages.original_text: "Naturally, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! It requires the gruelling labour of dozens of sturdy workers to create an upward movement of the liquid in the pipes! It is a most useful contraption!"

traits.locale_text: « Naturellement, Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! Elle nécessite les efforts éreintants de dizaines de robustes travailleurs pour faire jaillir le liquide des tuyaux ! C'est une invention fort utile ! »

languages.text: "Natürlich, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}. Es bedarf der aufreibenden Arbeit Dutzender Arbeiter, um die Flüssigkeit nach oben in die Rohre zu pumpen. Eine ausgesprochen nützliche Apparatur!"
languages.original_text: "Naturally, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! It requires the gruelling labour of dozens of sturdy workers to create an upward movement of the liquid in the pipes! It is a most useful contraption!"
